description:
Whenever Bunji needs to go to the bathroom, he is known for not being able to hold it and has a bad habit of continuing to play despite his need to go;  Bunji was covered in dirt when mom came to pick him up. She let him be and joined Morita-san and Nagasaki-san as they began to talk about being a mother of sons; Bunji is running all over the place sticking beans in his ears, a doll`s hand in his nose and digging himself a hole. Mom is speechless when Fumi says…; Fumi didn`t cry when going to school but that’s because…
Source: crunchyroll
